## Source: ossf-package-analysis (88bb1929f2833ad82c2f6c440a415f68b97ee03357947e1f3e2ab9202b9297db)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ml-interactive-data-augmentation' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
